Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog

Class CourseCatalog

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog.CourseCatalog
public class CourseCatalog extends Object
The CourseCatalog class manages a list of courses and provides various methods for interacting with a SortedList of catalog Courses. The class encapsulates the Course SortedList catalog. Provides add, remove, get behavior for a catalog Course. In addition, global behavior of resetting, saving, and loading in Course catalog.
Author:
Eswar Talasila

      public void loadCoursesFromFile(String fileName)
      Loads courses from a file into the catalog.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to load courses from
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified file cannot be found

    • addCourseToCatalog

      public boolean addCourseToCatalog(String name, String title, String section, int credits, String instructorId, int enrollmentCap, String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      Adds a course to the catalog with the specified attributes. Checks if a course with the same name and section already exists in the catalog. If not, it adds the course and returns true. If the course is already in the catalog, it returns false. If there is a scheduling conflict, it throws an IllegalArgumentException.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the course
      title - the title of the course
      section - the section of the course
      credits - the number of credits for the course
      instructorId - the instructor's ID for the course
      enrollmentCap - max students in course
      meetingDays - the meeting days for the course
      startTime - the start time of the course
      endTime - the end time of the course
      Returns:
      true if the addition of the course to the catalog is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a course with the same name already exists in the catalog or if there is a scheduling conflict

    • removeCourseFromCatalog

      public boolean removeCourseFromCatalog(String name, String section)
      Removes a course from the catalog with the specified name and section.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the course to remove
      section - the section of the course to remove
      Returns:
      true if the removal of the course was successful, false otherwise

    • getCourseFromCatalog

      public Course getCourseFromCatalog(String name, String section)
      Retrieves a course from the catalog with the specified name and section.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the course to retrieve
      section - the section of the course to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Course object from the catalog identified uniquely by the name and section parameters, or null if the course doesn't exist

    • getCourseCatalog

      public String[][] getCourseCatalog()
      Returns the course catalog as a 2-dimensional String array with rows for each catalog course and columns for name, section, title, and meeting string.
      Returns:
      a 2-dimensional String array representing the course catalog

    • saveCourseCatalog

      public void saveCourseCatalog(String fileName)
      Exports the schedule to the specified file name. If file cannot be exported
      Parameters:
      fileName - the export file name for course schedule
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file cannot be exported
